prev.title: Today learn agrep => approximative grep.
prev.summary: Today learn agrep => approximative grep. Based on Levenshtein distances, it's possible to search for words looking alike a word. https://t.co/3FsInURmeo I'm using it for my personal note taking tools. Knowledge organisation is powerfull!! Cc @nixcraft @climagic
